body:
Using master at 743c2f4:
```
./autogen.sh
./configure --with-libs=no
make -j6
lldb src/bench/bench_bitcoin -- -filter=VerifyScriptBench
```

title: segfault in bench_bitcoin if configured using --with-libs=no
